name: Sushime - Sushi Home Delivery App
description:
Sushime is a Figma sushi restaurant home delivery app. This UI kit can be used in home delivery, food restaurant business app projects. It contains 13 premium screens in perfect layered and consistency. All the elements are converted into components and Figma variants. Screens are compatible with android and IOS App.



Features : 


A. 13 High-quality premium Figma screens

B. 35+ Components and variants

C. Style Guide included

D. Poppins Font

E. Iconsax Icons

F. Layered and well organized



Screens :


1. Splash Screen

2. Onboard screen

3. Sign in

4. Add Address

5. Home

6. Product page

7. Sushi Cart

8. Payment Method

9. Payment Information

10. Payment Succesful

11. Order Succesful

12. Track Order

13. Profile

14. Notification



Source & Credits :


Font : Poppins ( https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Poppins)

Illustration : Storyset (https://storyset.com/)

Icons : Iconsax (https://iconsax.io/)

images : Unsplash (https://unsplash.com/)



Note: I have already organized all components. You just have to search in the assets panel to find what you want. All of the screens are connected by the prototype to understand and navigate the app easily


Thank you so much and keep supporting.
